level.heading: Short title.
level.text: This part may be cited as the "District of Columbia Traffic Act, 1925."

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in § 23-581 and § 50-1501.05.

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see §§ 101 to 104 of Prohibition on the Reckless Operation of Recreational Motor Vehicles Emergency Act of 2004 (D.C. Act 15-462, June 23, 2004, 51 DCR 6750).

level.heading: Mayor's orders
level.text: Establishment - Task Force on Transportation, see Mayor's Order 2001-147, October 3, 2001 (48 DCR 9522).
